name: 无常
description:
Wu Chang is a unique 2D side-scrolling RPG + simulation game with a distinctive art style.
In the game, you will play as Wu Chang, the enforcer of the underworld, and travel to different worlds of diverse styles to successfully guide the lingering souls back to the underworld.
During this process, you can explore different worlds, experience different local customs, and uncover the stories behind those souls.

·Simulation Management

On the streets of the underworld, you will become the agent owner of a small tavern and compete with other businesses.
Create innovative drink menus, recruit talented singers and clever waiters, decorate and upgrade the tavern, and step by step make the tavern bigger and stronger, becoming the highest-earning boss on the streets of the underworld!

·Mining, Fishing, Planting, and Bathing

Dig in various mines,
dig precious stones while also smashing monsters' heads!





As the saying goes, where there is water, there is most likely fish~ Cast your fishing rod by the poolside and wait for the big fish to bite!
It is said that you can even catch unexpected things while fishing.





Besides, diligently cultivate on my island and wait for the seeds to bloom,
You can give the blooming flowers as gifts or exchange them for money!





Meng Po opened a bath shop in the underworld called "Meng Po Soup", which can be considered a famous old brand for thousands of years. After a tiring walk, why not go in for a relaxing bath?


·Room Decoration

The rooms on the island can also be freely decorated with a wide variety of furniture styles. Can't wait to see a cozy little house!

·Exploration and Collection

Explore every corner of the underworld, collect strange and unique items, meet distinctive characters, and achieve unexpected achievements!

·Story Experience

Every soul you guide will introduce you to a new character and experience a story... with joy and sadness,
More importantly, it is a healing journey for the weary soul.
